name: 2022 7th Asia Conference on Environment and Sustainable Development
content: Paper Publication: Submissions will be reviewed by the conference committees, accepted and presented papers will be published as a volume of Springer book series: Environmental Science and Engineering which will be submitted for indexing by EI Compendex, Scopus, SCImago and the other major databases. Selected papers with extention will be published into the International Journal of Environmental Science and Development as a special issue, which will be indexed by Scopus, Chemical Abstracts Services (CAS), CABI, DOAJ, Ulrich Periodicals Directory, Crossref, ProQuest, etc.
